name: Cookie Connect Break
description:
Cookie Conect Break is match-3 puzzle game, connect the same color Cookies vertically, horizontally or diagonally as much as you can.

Features:
- Match three action puzzle gameplay.
- Burst bunches of cookie juicy explosion.
- Easy to learn, hard to master.
- Exciting and delicious cookie legend.
- Hundreds of sweet levels,updates will be continued!
- Sweet BGM, start an adventure with livelysound effect.
